name: Chronillogical
description:
Press backspace to restart the current level.

Made by Johan Helsing for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. The theme was "Rewind".

It can be a bit confusing at first, but I hope you like it :)

How it works (spoilers):

  • Time only moves when you move left/right.
  • There are two time dimensions. When you travel forward in one, the other one goes backwards.
  • Even though you rewind time, objects keep their momentum/speed.

One of the levels is pretty hard. Skip it by pressing c three times, and then press enter.
